reviews.text: Moving here with my small family of 2 from Shanghai, the environment is totally different. Firstly, the costs are doubled and the apartment size is halved ie. that's Korea's cost of living for you. Real estate prices are high, hence the more compact feel.
reviews.title: Good service apartment in best shopping location
Seoulfull Experience
reviews.text: Still, I can't be more happy to have chosen this service apartment for my 2 months stay. The location is the best ever, within these parts. It's Apgujeong .... the Beverly Hills of Korea, upmarket indeed. It is located in a huge rectangle area consisting of exhibition centers, more hotels, and huge underground mall. Everything is connected and within reach, via indoors passageways. My family was well entertained exploring the mall ins and outs throughout, plenty of food and entertainment (cinema, aquarium). The train station is just within these whole mass of congestion.

reviews.title: Pleasant, clean, spacious
reviews.text: Back to the establishment, english level is high at the front desk area except for phone requests (face to face conversation is better understood most of the time, with help of hand movements/signals). Overall, clean and upmarket. There are no facilities eg. gym, pool, etc..... but they have a sharing arrangement with the next door entertainment building (with casino, spa).
Oakwood COEX, as the epitome of a serviced apartment, was indeed a home away form home, and in some aspects, even better than my actual home! For starters, my own humdrum home doesn’t have:
reviews.title: Home Away From Home

reviews.text: - A steam room and shower unit in the bathroom
reviews.title: Best Serviced Hotel-Apartment

reviews.text: - Plasma TV in the living room and an additional regular TV in the Master-bedroom
reviews.title: Comfortable place for a longer stay

reviews.text: - Kitchen stocked with branded cutlery (also fully well-equipped with other appliances, dishwasher, fridge, even handy Lock&Lock tupper ware to stash those oh-so-yummy albeit stinky kim chee)
reviews.title: Great Serviced Apartments in Downtown Seoul
